title: Best of CES 2024
description: CES 2024 is all wrapped up! After looking at hundreds of products, were bringing you our list of some of the best and most interesting tech we had a chance to see. From best TVs (transparent to regular opaque ones), modular cars,  improved health tech, smarter kitchen appliances, and so, so many robots. Presented by Deloitte #CES2024 #Technology   Read more:    0:00 Intro 0:25 Best wheels (Hyundai Mobis E-corner system) 1:22 Best smart home gadget (EcoFlow Delta Pro Ultra) 2:29 Best gaming monitor (Dell Alienware AW3225QF) 3:47 Best wearable (Evie smart ring by Movano) 4:38 Best health device (Dexcom Stelo) 5:30 Best car (Kia PV5 modular car & Honda Space Hub) 6:47 Best TV (and best in show) (Transparent LG OLED T) 8:01 Actual best TV (Samsung S95D QD OLED Anti Glare TV) 8:37 Outro and Beccas fav (Sony Afeela)  The Verges sponsors play an important role in funding our journalism, but do not influence editorial content.
